articles.description: Ferrari (RACE.MI) and Amazon Web Services (AWS) have entered an agreement to make Amazon's (AMZN.O) cloud computing unit the luxury carmaker's cloud storage, machine learning, and artificial intelligence provider, AWS said on Friday.
articles.content: The Ferrari logo is seen at the company's headquarters in Maranello, Italy, June 8, 2021. Picture taken June 8, 2021. REUTERS/Guglielmo Mangiapane/FilesMILAN, June 18 (Reuters) - Ferrari (RACE.MI) an… [+1431 chars]

articles.title: Streaming reaches new milestone - Axios
